item.title: 【UPSCALED】Yello ft. Heidi Happy - You Better Hide [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit / PCM 24-bit 48 kHz]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Jazz
Style: Lounge, Future Jazz, Downtempo
Year: 2009
Source: Vimeo WebMaster 1080p

"You Better Hide" is a song by Swiss electronic band Yello featuring Swiss singer-songwriter Heidi Happy on vocals. It's the second track on their 12th studio album "Touch Yello" and the fourth video on "Touch Yello: The Virtual Concert". The song was released as a single on August 26, 2016. Heidi Happy's real name is Priska Zemp, and she is a popular folk and jazz singer in Switzerland.

The song has received positive reviews from music critics; some have praised the vocal performance and the lyrics' emotional resonance. While many Yello songs are upbeat and danceable, "You Better Hide" showcases the duo's ability to create a slower, more contemplative track. The singer's hauntingly beautiful voice adds depth to the song's lyrics and helps convey the emotional message.

The song's music video is in black and white and is directed by Dirk Koy.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video Enhance AI and converted to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (24-bit 48 kHz). It's the default track from the WebMaster, left as is.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
